root.name: Blood Drive
root.description: Development It was originally titled Death Drive, when it was accidentally listed on Gamefly six months prior to its completion.Story The game takes place in a post-apocalyptic and post-zombie apocalypse future, where television contestants compete against each other while avoiding and/or by killing zombies.GameplayPlayers must destroy other cars with the use of pickup weapons whilst being attacked by hordes of zombies, if a player kills enough zombies it activates their special move.The game supports up to four players at any one time.
